column5: Our home is just 5 miles from Kyle Field. We are centrally located and close to Wolf Pen Creek, Central Park, airport, Post Oak Mall, Texas A&M University. Our home is family-friendly and in a great neighborhood just off of Highway 6. For all those Aggie events or whatever the occasion may be, we hope you feel at home and truly get to enjoy all that this unique community offers.
column8: A Friendly Home for the Whole Family
